description: Forest Department - Order to declare - Dambukanda Forest in Henapola, Mantanigoda, Weweldeniya, Ihalagama, Meerigama  D/S Division, Gampaha District as Reserved Forest - Ulugala Minipura Forest in Okkampitiya and Minipura, Buttala D/S Division, Monaragala District as Conservation Forest - Vakaneri Forest, Toppigala Forest, Panichchankerni Forest in Koralepattu North D/S Division and Unnichchei Forest in Maanmunei West D/S Division, Erarurpattu in Batticaloa District as Reserved Forests
